protocol.text: Sterilized seeds were kept for 2 days at 4degreesC in the dark and were sown on plates of growth medium (GM) agar containing 1% sucrose. All plates were set in a growth chamber at 22degreesC and relative humidity (approximately 60%) under a 16 h light (approximately 40 umols−1m−2)/8 h dark cycle. The drought stress experiment was conducted at 21degreesC and 40% +/- 5% relative humidity under 16 h/8 h light/dark conditions in a plant growth room. Harvested plant samples were immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at −80degreesC until use.
Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (24K) was conducted according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
